$interpreted: : Two weeks after the castle fell from the sky...
Naya: Angel, so this is where you've been!
Angelia: Naya!?
Naya: We couldn't find you after the meeting with Colonel Levon. Everyone's worried about you!
Naya: Is something bothering you? You've been acting strange...
Angelia: I was just thinking... do we really stand a chance against Theodore?
Naya: What? Why would you even say that?
Angelia: Because of what Colonel Levon said. Even with the castle crashing, Theodore still has more troops under his control than all the Sunshine Infantry.
Angelia: If a war were to break out now...
Naya: War is more than just numbers. Besides, Colonel Levon also said he'd find us some more allies, remember?
Angelia: But if war breaks out, there'll be casualties... People won't be able to lead peaceful lives.
Angelia: And... am I really strong enough to beat him?
Naya: Angelia Carlos!
Naya: If someone with as much ambition as Theodore were to rule, he would certainly declare war on other countries.
Naya: More and more innocent people would fall victim to war!
Angelia: You... You're right...
Naya: Angel, there are so many people out there waiting for you to defeat Theodore and take back your right to rule.
Naya: How are you going to live up to their expectations if you don't even have confidence in yourself?
Angelia: I know...
Naya: Let's go back. Everyone's worried about you.
Naya: Who's there!?
Ralph: Please, lower your weapons. I'm just here to deliver a message from King Theodore.
Angelia: Uncle... What does he want?
Ralph: A war between both sides will only harm the Kingdom's future. King Theodore hopes to discuss this further with you tonight, Princess.
Ralph: He hopes this war can be prevented through diplomacy.
Naya: Ridiculous, who would fall for a trap like that!
Ralph: To show his sincerity, King Theodore will only bring me as a bodyguard, and hold the meeting on the outskirts of Totemtaff.
Angelia: What if I refuse?
Ralph: King Theodore will also bring along a friend of the Princess. If you don't come, your friend will be very... disappointed, to say the least.
Angelia: Friend?
Ralph: A little boy named Lio. King Theodore wanted to know more about the Princess' experience in the Slums...
Naya: Damnit!
Ralph: My duty here is complete. I hope the princess doesn't let His Majesty down.
Ralph: And please, keep this meeting a secret.
Naya: Angel, what should we do?
Angelia: ......

Model.Text: Two weeks after the castle fell from the sky...
Angel, so this is where you've been!
Naya!?
We couldn't find you after the meeting with Colonel Levon. Everyone's worried about you!
Is something bothering you? You've been acting strange...
I was just thinking... do we really stand a chance against Theodore?
What? Why would you even say that?
Because of what Colonel Levon said. Even with the castle crashing, Theodore still has more troops under his control than all the Sunshine Infantry.
If a war were to break out now...
War is more than just numbers. Besides, Colonel Levon also said he'd find us some more allies, remember?
But if war breaks out, there'll be casualties... People won't be able to lead peaceful lives.
And... am I really strong enough to beat him?
Angelia Carlos!
If someone with as much ambition as Theodore were to rule, he would certainly declare war on other countries.
More and more innocent people would fall victim to war!
You... You're right...
Angel, there are so many people out there waiting for you to defeat Theodore and take back your right to rule.
How are you going to live up to their expectations if you don't even have confidence in yourself?
I know...
Let's go back. Everyone's worried about you.
Who's there!?
Please, lower your weapons. I'm just here to deliver a message from King Theodore.
Uncle... What does he want?
A war between both sides will only harm the Kingdom's future. King Theodore hopes to discuss this further with you tonight, Princess.
He hopes this war can be prevented through diplomacy.
Ridiculous, who would fall for a trap like that!
To show his sincerity, King Theodore will only bring me as a bodyguard, and hold the meeting on the outskirts of Totemtaff.
What if I refuse?
King Theodore will also bring along a friend of the Princess. If you don't come, your friend will be very... disappointed, to say the least.
Friend?
A little boy named Lio. King Theodore wanted to know more about the Princess' experience in the Slums...
Damnit!
My duty here is complete. I hope the princess doesn't let His Majesty down.
And please, keep this meeting a secret.
Angel, what should we do?
